trends: There has been one other sighting in Ajax
There were no other sightings in Ajax on or around March 17th 2010
divs: sighting detailsthe object was travelling from nne in a ssw direction. from where my house is located in ajax the object was travelling towards lake ontario\the pickering nuclear plant\city of toronto. all three would have laid in it's path. there were two lights, very dim but more than enough to keep the object sighted. it's difficult to describe the size, my best guess would be approximately the size of a medium fixed wing aircraft, like a lear jet possibly. it was completely silent, and the two lights appeared to be offset for the direction it was travelling. i've seen birds at night time, but this was different. it was travelling so fast and straight and it looked to be a void in the middle, neither black or light gray like the sky, but just an empty space in the middle of these two fixed points. the sighting lasted approximately 10 seconds or less before it passed to the other side of my house. 1. i just arrived home from work where i drive a city bus. 2. i often look up in the sky on clear nights while i have a smoke before going indoors, i see quite a few "shooting stars" on nights like this, including the odd satellite passing over. 3. a jet, but even after it had passed over i heard no sound from it. 4. it flew straight and level, as though it was gliding...but very quick! 5. i was stunned and left asking what the hell was that?! i feld odd afterwards, like i couldn't explain what it was. then i started thinking it must have been birds, two white birds - but again the object was quicker than any birds i've ever seen day or night. i also have never seen birds quite that well lit up like these two tips were. birds will also move diffently that what these two lights were doing. 6. the object passed over my house and it was moving to fast for me to get to the other side. it would have been long gone.
Summary: An object passed over my house at a high rate of speed, completely silent.
